text: "In many cases, the total matched will increase closer to the start after it has an LPT with 0 matched," Not sure what you are trying to say - that's exactly the behaviour one would expect after a voiding. In your example.log it looks like 61489741 was scratched at/before 239 seconds. In the following minute some people placed bets on a few runners after the voiding hence the picture at 180+. You need to look at the packets prior to 239 to see what happened.
